thread.title: Federal judge halts Trump's travel ban nationwide
thread.title_full: Federal judge halts Trump's travel ban nationwide

title: Federal judge halts Trump's travel ban nationwide
text: Federal judge halts Trump's travel ban nationwide U.S. District Senior Judge James Robart of Seattle has issued a nationwide restraining order blocking the travel ban put in place by President Trump. The decision comes shortly after a judge out of Boston ruled in favor of Trump's ban. Post to Facebook Federal judge halts Trump's travel ban nationwide U.S. District Senior Judge James Robart of Seattle has issued a nationwide restraining order blocking the travel ban put in place by President Trump. The decision comes shortly after a judge out of Boston ruled in favor of Trump's ban.  //usat.ly/2l2pnEp   Federal judge halts Trump's travel ban nationwide CLOSE
